H0.text: What is minus 40 degrees Farenheit expressed as degrees Centigrade. -20°C

H1.text: What is minus 40 degrees Farenheit expressed as degrees Centigrade. 0°C

H2.text: What is minus 40 degrees Farenheit expressed as degrees Centigrade. -100°C

H3.text: What is minus 40 degrees Farenheit expressed as degrees Centigrade. minus 40, the same

A4.text: The Fahrenheit and Celsius scales intersect numerically at −40 in the respective unit (i.e., −40 °F corresponds to −40 °C)
